pr_title: Remove misleading unsupported features mention for Python streaming

timeline.message: Remove misleading unsupported features mention for Python streaming

timeline.bodyText: I believe handling of late data is also supported now. @angoenka / @y1chi could you confirm?
timeline.author: aaltay
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -168,9 +168,7 @@ Python streaming execution does not currently support the following features.
 
 These unsupported Beam features apply to all runners.
 
-- `State` and `Timers` APIs
 - Custom source API
-- Splittable `DoFn` API
 - Handling of late data

replies.bodyText: Yes, late data is also supported.
replies.author: y1chi

replies.bodyText: Thanks, I removed the entire unsupported features section.
replies.author: tweise

replies.bodyText: The only real remaining item, "User-defined custom merging WindowFn (with fnapi)" is specific to portability, will add a pointer to the portable runner support table instead.
replies.author: tweise
